text: The Patriarchal Cross of Romania (Romanian: Crucea Patriarhală) is the highest Romanian Orthodox ecclesiastical decoration, established in 1925 by Patriarch Miron Cristea. ==Recipients== *Ilie Ilașcu (1994) *Andrei Ivanțoc (1994) *Tudor Petrov-Popa (1994) *Alexandru Leșco (1994) *Petru Godiac (1994) *Dumitru Oprea (2005) *Constantin Bălăceanu-Stolnici *Traian Băsescu (2007) *Simona Halep (2019) ==References== Category:Romanian decorations Category:Awards established in 1925 Category:Eastern Orthodox ecclesiastical decorations
title: Patriarchal Cross of Romania
